      • getCorrection

        public Vector2 getCorrection(Collider coll,
                    Vector2 velocity)
        Gives you the correction if you have a moving collider somewhere in the map.
        Parameters:
        coll - The moving collider (before moving)
        velocity - Said collider's movement vector
        Returns:
        The "correction" - just add this to your movement vector and you won't collide with anything

      • sortColliders

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Collision> sortColliders(java.util.ArrayList<Collision> collection)
        Uses quicksort to sort a batch of collisions by distance traveled.
        Parameters:
        collection -
        Returns:
        the sorted batch

        See Also:

      • saveEntityFull

        public static void saveEntityFull(Entity e,
                  R2DTypeCollection c,
                  boolean ignorePrefab)
        Saves an entity into the given collection completely - meaning that it not only saves the Entity's data, but the data of its components as well.
        Parameters:
        e - Entity to save / compile
        c - Collection to save to
        ignorePrefab - Whether or not to ignore being a prefab. If this is false and an entity is a prefab, only the path to the prefab will be saved, as well as certain essential variables (pos,name,rotation,uuid).

      • loadR2DFile
